description:
Section 73 application (Minor Material Amendment) to vary condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission ref: P2019/3483/FUL, dated 11/06/2020 which granted permission for: 
Extension and refurbishment of existing building including erection of a mansard roof extension with rear terrace, plant enclosure and rooflights; removal of access between 17 and 18 Clerkenwell Close; refurbishment of rear facade with new terrace and openings to the rear at first floor level; refurbishment of windows throughout as required; and associated internal works.
The proposed amendments comprise: Additional plant equipment on the roof of the consented fourth floor comprising new VRF units and a new roof cowl, and an increase in parapet height.
